ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESC1: Hi, I'm Miqueas and I'm a programmer since 2020, in the middle of the pandemic I ventured into this beautiful world of programming, I started programming in Processing, then in the faculty programming in paper (Pascal), from there I became passionate about programming and technology.
ABOUT.DESC2: I like order and aesthetics, I try to replicate my tastes in the creation of attractive user interfaces, friendly and accessible (a11y), I also like everything related to data management, I consider that today is the new oil (black gold), so I really like creating applications that can be used for data management.
ABOUT.DESC3: I am currently studying Information and Communication Technologies (ICT analyst) at the Faculty of Informatics (UNLP).
ABOUT.DESC4: Besides this I am aware that the world of programming is immense and it is not enough to stay with formal studies, and that is why I combine my academic training with my curiosity and self-taught personality.
ABOUT.DESC5: At the moment I am focusing on the following technologies: Front:Angular(Material, primeNG, ng2-charts), TailwindCSS(flowbite), RxJS, TypeScript, BackEnd: NodejS(NestJS + expressJS) DB: MongoDB, MySql, MariaDB
ABOUT.DESC6: I am also interested in learning and researching new technologies and concepts, such as: .NET (C#), Testing: Jasmine and Karma, Cloud: Azure.
ABOUT.CONTACT: If you want to program something or have a chat, feel free to contact me.

INFOAPP.TITLE: Angular Portfolio
INFOAPP.DESC: SPA made with Angular14, TailwindCSS and TypeScript, RxJS, Material, SweetAlert, aos, ng-arrangement, etc.
